text: Nihsandeha juna manisaharu allahabata utari'eko kitabako adesala'i chupa'era thorai mulyama becdachan nihsandeha tinale aphno petama ago bharirakheka chan. Yasta manisaharusita allahale kiyamataka dina kura pani garne chaina nata uniharula'i papabata mukta garnecha. Apitu tiniharuka lagi kastadayaka sajaya hunecha
